media:group.media:title: What Developers Thought of WWDC 2021
media:group.media:description:
In this video, Kilo Loco and Eman Harout (@emanharout) do a recap of the announcements made during WWDC 2021 and give their thoughts on how the new technologies will affect iOS developers over the next year.
0:00:00 - Intro 0:08:30 - FaceTime 0:11:06 - Messages 0:14:03 - Notifications 0:16:02 - Focus 0:19:47 - Live Text 0:21:18 - Spotlight 0:23:44 - Photo Memories 0:24:44 - Wallet 0:27:40 - Weather 0:28:49 - Maps 0:31:15 - AirPods 0:34:16 - iPadOS 0:40:43 - Privacy 0:44:44 - watchOS 0:45:38 - Home 0:48:48 - macOS 0:54:03 - Developer Technologies 0:59:10 - Final Thoughts
Kilo Loco on Social Media: www.kiloloco.com Discord - https://discord.gg/E7bNDWz Twitter - https://twitter.com/kilo_loco Instagram - https://instagram.com/kilo_loco
#WWDC21 #AppleEvent #iOSDev

entry.title: Cache Images and URLs with Flutter | Day 27 - #30DaysOfFlutter

media:group.media:title: Cache Images and URLs with Flutter | Day 27 - #30DaysOfFlutter
media:group.media:description:
Kilo Loco shows you how to cache remote images and their URLs with Flutter. In this tutorial, you will learn how to create an image URL cache with AWS Amplify Storage, access the cached image URL to display a cached image, and save profile changes using Amplify DataStore.
*** Show Notes and Links ***
Project Files: https://github.com/Kilo-Loco/30DaysOfFlutter/tree/main/day27_cache_image
Kilo Loco on Social Media: www.kiloloco.com Discord - https://discord.gg/E7bNDWz Twitter - https://twitter.com/kilo_loco Instagram - https://instagram.com/kilo_loco
#flutter #dartlang #30DaysOfFlutter

media:group.media:title: Flutter: Social Media App
media:group.media:description: In this live stream, Kilo Loco works on wrapping up the remaining UI for the post feed of the social media app

entry.title: Upload Images to Amplify Using Flutter | Day 26 - #30DaysOfFlutter

media:group.media:title: Upload Images to Amplify Using Flutter | Day 26 - #30DaysOfFlutter
media:group.media:description:
Kilo Loco shows you how to upload files to AWS Amplify using the BLoC Library and Flutter. In this tutorial, you will learn how to add the Storage category to your Amplify app, upload images to Amazon S3, and get the URL of the images to display in the user profile.
*** Show Notes and Links ***
Project Files: https://github.com/Kilo-Loco/30DaysOfFlutter/tree/main/day26_upload_images
Kilo Loco on Social Media: www.kiloloco.com Discord - https://discord.gg/E7bNDWz Twitter - https://twitter.com/kilo_loco Instagram - https://instagram.com/kilo_loco
#flutter #dartlang #30DaysOfFlutter

entry.title: Camera and Photo Gallery Using Image Picker with Flutter | Day 25 - #30DaysOfFlutter

media:group.media:title: Camera and Photo Gallery Using Image Picker with Flutter | Day 25 - #30DaysOfFlutter
media:group.media:description:
Kilo Loco shows you how to use the image picker package to take pictures with the camera and access photos from the user's photo gallery with Flutter. This tutorial will cover using platform specific widgets, using the device's camera and accessing photos from the photo library, and displaying the picked photo as an avatar picture.
0:00 - Intro 0:36 - Configuring Permissions 3:18 - Updating Profile Event 4:18 - Cross Platform Action Sheet 9:49 - Determine When to Show Action Sheet 15:19 - Using the Image Picker 20:12 - Showing Cross Platform Widget 22:09 - Outro
*** Show Notes and Links ***

entry.title: User Profile UI with BLoC and Flutter | Day 24 - #30DaysOfFlutter

media:group.media:title: User Profile UI with BLoC and Flutter | Day 24 - #30DaysOfFlutter
media:group.media:description:
Kilo Loco shows you how to build out the user profile UI with functionality as the current user and when viewing another user's profile in Flutter. This tutorial covers laying out the profile UI, state management with BLoC, and dependency injection.
0:00 - Intro 1:19 - Creating Profile View 7:35 - Create Profile Events 10:54 - Create Profile State 16:11 - Create Profile Bloc 20:36 - Dependency Injection for Profile Bloc 24:57 - Connecting Widgets to State 33:47 - Outro
*** Show Notes and Links ***
Project Files: https://github.com/Kilo-Loco/30DaysOfFlutter/tree/main/day24_user_profile_ui
